text: Facheiroa ulei is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil, and occurs in northern Bahia east of the San Francisco River, at elevations of 400 to 950 m. Its natural habitats are rocky areas and hot tropic desert scrub. ==References== ulei Category:Cacti of South America Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Bahia Category:Data deficient plants Category:Least concern biota of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Facheiroa ulei
